text: After wrapping up the schedule of Avengers : Infinity War, Josh Brolin has taken over the role of Cable from Deadpool 2. The actor, who will be playing Cable alongside Ryan Reynolds in the Deadpool sequel, began his preparation for the role some months ago. Posting pictures from his workout sessions, the actor has been actively showing off his body transformation on social media platforms. However, the stunning transformation has raised a few eyebrows.
